thread.title: Cartel Market Specials: Week of March 20, 2017
thread.title_full: Cartel Market Specials: Week of March 20, 2017

author: NickAvola
title: Cartel Market Specials: Week of March 20, 2017
text:
Cartel Market Specials: Week of March 20, 2017 Get your hands on some Cartel Coins! GEAR UP 
There’s never been a better week to expand your gear collection! Not only can you score any item to EVER be featured on the Cartel Market with the Grand Chance Cube, but you can instantly equip the galaxy’s greatest battle armor with the Gold Cartel Armor AND kick off your Imperial military career with the awe-inspiring Advanced Agent Bundle. More details below: GRAND CHANCE CUBE: DIRECT SALE ITEM 
ONE WEEK ONLY: Tuesday, March 21 - Tuesday, March 28 -- 160 Cartel Coins The entire Cartel Market in your hand. Every Grand Chance Cube contains one randomly-selected Pack item, including the rarest of armor sets, mounts, weapons, decorations, and more! ADVANCED AGENT BUNDLE: NEW DIRECT SALE BUNDLE PACK 
ONE WEEK ONLY: Tuesday, March 21 - Tuesday, March 28 – 3,350 Cartel Coins NOW 2,345 CARTEL COINS The perfect starter kit for an ambitious Imperial Agent looking to climb through the ranks. Each bundle pack includes the Aratech Ghost speeder, Intelligence Officer Armor Set, DLA-13 Heavy Blaster Rifle, and Tac-HUD Heavy Sniper Rifle! GREE HYPERGATE REST AND RECHARGE: DIRECT SALE ITEM 
WEEKEND ONLY: Friday, March 24 - Tuesday, March 28 Recover your stamina with the help of ancient and unpredictable Gree technology. You’ll be sure to impress your friends with this advanced Rest and Recharge tool! GOLD CARTEL ARMOR PACK: RETURNING GRAND PACK 
WEEKEND ONLY: Friday, March 24 - Tuesday, March 28 Head into battle wearing the greatest battle armor from across the galaxy! Each Gold Armor Pack contains a full set of gear, randomly-selected from only the rarest and highest-valued armor sets ever to hit the Cartel Market. GRAND CHANCE CUBE GREE HYPERGATE REST AND RECHARGE GOLD CARTEL ARMOR PACK Terms Archive | NEW! Privacy & Cookie Policy | NEW!
